text: Shouts, and the clatter of feet meant Goldie and Leo Grundy were on their way. Kennan pulled the manacle chain taut, and blasted two shots at the link which tied him to the ring-bolt in the rock: The nine-millimetre bullets smashed the chain as if it had been plastic, and, free, though the chain still dangled, he threw himself across the floor towards the entrance.
